TopicTitle: Keep crashing into Axis Indicator and AltimeterThreeHands

Articles.Content: Trying to launch the MPSS Natilus, using the Jool V rocket part. Just before the SRB's separate, the entire rocket comes apart and the pieces fall to the ground. Mission summary says the Jool V main tank crashed the into the "Axis Indicator" or sometimes it's the "AltimeterThreeHands"
Sounds like you need more struts. Or throttle down a bit to lower the G forces.

EDIT: Sorry, I think I was imagining things.

Edited October 1, 2013 by softweir
Checked my fatcs, decided I was wrong.

This really sounds like you need more struts. You can also put struts to parts attached underneath by placing the beginning above and the End of the Strut below the Border.

Thats something I had to learn from HOCGaming.

It also stops the mainsail to squish the tank above it... or to drive it through your entire rocket up into the command pod
